page.title: 18Employment Parent's Work
page.content: {Gary}My Dad's job is working down the mine.He likes working down the mine. His job is fixing machinery that has broken down. This week my Dad is on nightshift.When I got up at 6 o'clock.My Dad just came in.I said,"Dad can I have my breakfast?" "Wait son,I have just got in." I said "Right oh Dad." The pit my Dad works at is called Whittle Pit. {Stuart}My Mother's Job. My Mother's job is a cleaner.She works at The Haven.She has an overall with HOME HELP written on her pocket. Sometimes my mam and I go to visit my Auntie Maragaret who lives in The Haven.My Mam and I talk to my Auntie Maragaret.We say"How are you doing?"My Auntie says,"I am alright." My Mam works very hard at her job.
